text: The Stožice Stadium () is a football stadium in Ljubljana, Slovenia and is the home stadium of Olimpija Ljubljana and the Slovenia national football team. It has a capacity of 16,038. The stadium was opened on 11 August 2010. == Other websites == * Category:2010 establishments in Europe Category:Establishments in Slovenia Category:Football stadiums in Europe Category:Buildings and structures in Slovenia Category:Football in Slovenia Category:Ljubljana
title: Stožice Stadium
